data.title: Clients of Haldan Consulting
data.meta_description: Haldan Consulting has clients in many industries including Automotive, Chemicals & Plastics, Energy & Electrical, FMCG, Health & Medical, Pharmaceutical, Textiles and Tooling. View the list of clients.
data.text:
ADCOCK INGRAM

Adcock Ingram manufactures and distributes a wide range of medicines and healthcare products. At their Clayville plant in South Africa, they manufacture high volume pharmaceutical liquids.

HaldanMES

ADIENT PPC

Adient P Pather Capital (Pty) Ltd is a Tier 2 Automotive seat structure supplier, based in Port Elizabeth. They are also a shareholder in CRH-Africa Automotive (Pty) Ltd.

AutoEDI

APTUSCARE

AptusCare is a software platform that delivers efficient, reliable and secure cloud-based HIPAA-compliant care coordination that enables providers to gain real-time insights into their patient population with functionality to track patient outcomes and process metrics.

Software Development

BORBET SOUTH AFRICA

Borbet South Africa is a manufacturer of aluminum alloy road wheels for the OEM market. Their plant is situated in in Perseverance, Port Elizabeth and is part of the larger Borbet Group which extends through eight locations globally.

HaldanMES

CRH AFRICA

CRH Africa, situated in Korsten (Port Elizabeth) is a manufacturer of seat components and catalytic converters for the automotive industry. They are part of a larger group which operates principally in South Africa.

AutoEDI | HaldanMES

EBOR AUTOMOTIVE SYSTEMS

EBOR Automotive is situated in Perseverance (Port Elizabeth) and manufactures high quality technical moldings and safety critical assembly components to the South African automotive industry, as well as to the global OEM customers.

HaldanMES

FORMEX INDUSTRIES

Formex Industries, located in Port Elizabeth, is comprised of Formex Tubing and Formex Pressings. Formex Tubing shapes and distributes metal tubing, while Formex Pressings supplies various pressed metal parts to the automotive industry.

HaldanMES | AutoEDI

FOXTEC-IKHWEZI

Foxtec-Ikhwezi is based in East London (Eastern Cape) and supplies parts to the South African and European production plants of Mercedes Benz. Together with their Meinerzhagen branch, they cover the full requirements for assembly-ready forged aluminum link arms for the new Mercedes Benz C-Class and E-Class products in South Africa.

HaldanMES

FROETEK SOUTH AFRICA

Froetek South Africa was founded in 2006, as a subsidiary company of the global FRÖTEK Group. Their plant in the East London IDZ (Eastern Cape) specializes in the injection molding of high performance components for the automotive industry and the battery industry.

HaldanMES

HENROSE PLASTICS

Henrose Plastics supplies a wide range of general packaging from heat shrinkable film, to bags of different sizes. Blue chip Pharmaceutical, Chocolate, Poultry, Fishing, Bottling and major motor industry suppliers, all rely on Henrose Plastics for their packaging needs.

HaldanMES

LEAR CORPORATION

Lear Sewing is located in Neave Industrial (Uitenhage) and forms part of the larger Lear Corporation. They are a worldwide supplier of automotive seating systems and electrical systems.

AutoEDI

LUMOTECH

Lumotech is an automotive and commercial lighting manufacturer situated in Neave Industrial (Uitenhage). Lumotech’s products include both automotive and commercial ranges; from headlights, tail lights, signal light and specialized plastic injection moldings, to energy efficient streetlights and warehouse lights.

HaldanMES | AutoEDI

PRAGA TECHNICAL

Praga Technical is a privately owned South African company established in October 1977 and is based in Rosslyn (Pretoria). They provide one of the most comprehensive metal pressing, manufacturing and tool, jig and fixture facilities available to the industry.

AutoEDI

PRAGMA

Pragma is an an engineering company and service provider that delivers enterprise asset management solutions to asset-intensive industries, with clients in the mining, manufacturing, local government, distributed facilities and OEM sectors.

Software Development

Q-PLAS AUTOMOTIVE

Q-Plas Automotive specializes in plastic-injection molding and they supply a range of interior, exterior and under-bonnet plastic components to the automotive industry. Situated in the Nelson Mandela Bay Logistics Park (Uitenhage), Q-Plas is a premium client of Haldan Consulting services, benefitting from a complete end-to-end solution.

HaldanMES | AutoEDI

RAMSAY ENGINEERING

Ramsay Engineering is privately owned, volume manufacturer of metal, plastic and leatherette automotive components. Their core competence is metal stamping, but also including plastic injection molding, automotive trim, component assemblies, automotive accessories, tool and die, amongst others.

AutoEDI

RG BROSE

RG Brose South Africa manufactures window regulators and door systems at their JIT (Just-in-Time) facility in Brits (North West). They also have a SILS (Supply-in-Line-Sequence) manufacturing facility in East London (Eastern Cape).

AutoEDI

SAN MIGUEL

San Miguel is a global fruit and vegetable, production, processing and citrus export leading company, with offices in Argentina, Uruguay and South Africa. It is the largest lemon exporter of Argentina and the Southern Hemisphere and is among the top processing companies for obtaining processed food.

Consulting

SENIOR FLEXONICS

Senior Flexonics SA designs, manufactures and supplies thin-gauge flexible stainless-steel components and assemblies to original equipment producers in the aerospace, defense, land vehicle and energy markets. They are situated in Cape Town.

AutoEDI

SHATTERPRUFE

Shatterprufe manufactures and distributes glass products, such as windscreens, rear and side glass. Shatterprufe is the largest nationally-based windscreen and automotive glass supplier in South Africa.

HaldanMES

SMA ENGINEERING SA

SMA Engineering SA is a supplier to the Automotive industry based in East London. They focus on bending, assembly, and manufacturing of air conditioning and engine cooling lines.

Consulting

SMITHS MANUFACTURING

Smiths Manufacturing (Pty) Ltd is a leading manufacturer and assembler of automotive air-conditioning and engine cooling components in Durban, South Africa. Metair Investments Limited, a JSE listed company, is their major shareholding company, along with DENSO CORPORATION, who has a 25% shareholding.

HaldanMES

VALEO

Valeo is an automotive supplier and partner to automakers worldwide. As a technology company, they design innovative solutions for smart mobility, with a particular focus on intuitive driving and reducing CO2 emissions.

AutoEDI

VIBRACOUSTIC-IKHWEZI

Vibracoustic-Ikhwezi is located in East London (Eastern Cape) and they manufacture bushing and anti-vibration components for both passenger car and commercial vehicles. They were established in 2012 by a marriage between two industry leaders, the global Vibracoustic Group and the South African Ikhwezi Investment Holdings Company.

HaldanMES
